text: Hello i am creating a app for marketplace first i have to create a developer account and create a app but when i hit the install url it get me the error you are installing a unverified app and when i verified the company domain it get me the error
It's says that because you haven't verified the app with HubSpot
you need to go through a verification process to get that message to go away, if it's just your company using it through I wouldn't be worried about seeing it
